commit_message:
Merge pull request #1 from MartinGuehmann/SpeedUpAndReduceMemory

Speed up and reduce memory load while loading a previous run
Move the last tings that should be done while loading into the ObjectData loading methods
Add files to .gitignore
CamelCase all the methods in DataObject
Moved ClansWindow.rmgaps to DataObject.removeGaps and call it from the load methods directly instead afterwards
Sort the data in ClansWindow.loadalternatemenuitemActionPerformed whether it belongs to the DataObject

Move ClansWindow.seedstart and all copies of that code to DataObject.initializePositions

Have it always called from within DataObject when data is loaded from file
Use alway a position range from 0.0f to 1.0f, does not make a difference for drawing
Move the static members to the top of ClansWindow
Mark the member variables in ClansWindow.load by explicitly using the this pointer
Order the fields of the DataObject in the same order in ClansWindow.load as they are declared
Use ClansWindow.importFromOptionsDialog() and ClansWindow.exportToOptionsDialog() instead of duplicated code
Clean up code for checking whether the clusering is running in ClansWindow
Clean up white space in ClansWindow.load
Rename ClansWindow.updatevals to ClansWindow.updateOptionsWindow and remove duplicated code on optionsDialog
Remove duplicated code from ClansWindow.load, now try to use all the data available if the load was incomplete
Remove duplicated code in ClansWindow for calculating the relative sequence lengths
ClansWindow: Do not trim the sequence names like in Main.java
Rename ClansWindow.namehash to ClansWindow.nameHash and cleanup
Acelerate data loading by removing the hash map from ObjectData.updateAttVals(), this check is now already done on data loading
Put the original objects into the list of getblasthitsubset and getmyattvalssubset
Fix singleton selection, in fact that should be archived without messing around with the data
Accelerate getblasthitsubset and getmyattvalssubset by using ints instead of Strings as hash keays and without copying objects
When a clans save file is loaded and it does not contain position data, then it is initialized
Make the attVal calculation also work properly for e-values instead of just p-values
Remove not used file ClansUtils.java
Encapsulate hash key generation, and symetresize blasthit matrix (needs less memory)
Move some code from ClansWindow to DataObject.normalizeAttVals()
Accelearte reading of BLAST results by using longs instead of strings as hash keys
Remove unused local variable
Accelearte DataObject.updateAttVals by using longs instead of Strings for hash keys and thus accelerate loading
Move getattvals, getattvalsimple, and getattvalmult of ClansWindow to updateAttVals, getAttValSimple, and getAttValMult of DataObject
Remove unnecessary parameters from getattvals, getattvalsimple, and getattvalmult
Use !ObjectData.hasBlastHits() instead of ObjectData.blastHits == null
Use this.data.complexatt instead of attvalsimple
Remove duplicated code from ClansWindow.getattvals
Merge two copies of the duplicated code in ClansWindow.getattvals
Remove the non-warented variations in the code copies in ClansWindow.getattvals
Seperate the rescalePValues property from the GUI and add it to DataObject and make it saveable, use an ItemListener to synchronize complexatt, cluster2d, showinfo, and rescalePValues with the GUI
Add some comments to getattvalsimple and getattvalmult
Remove unsused paremeters from ClansWindow.getattvalsimple and ClansWindow.getattvalmult
Simplify ClansWindow.cluster3d
Move ClansWindow.getattvals to DtaObject.filterAndReplaceAttVals (attvals version)
Do not create a new DataObject for saving use the one of ClansWindow instead
Minor code cleanup
Remove more duplicated code of optionswindow from ClansWindow
Save zoom factor and the weight in the clans file
Reoder the fields of DataObject for saving in the same order as declared in DataObject
Save the showinfocheckbox status, discoved while some code reordering
Finish moving data to DataObject, last was rotmtx from ClansWindow.drawing
Move colorarr and colorcutoffs from ClansWindow,drawpanel to DataObject
Move ovalsize, dotsize, groupsize, and zoom(factor) from ClansWindow.drawpanel to DataObject
Use the same default ovalsize in ClansWindow.drawing as in DataObject
Simplify code

Move more duplicated code from ClansWindow optionsdialog

Turns out that the copy in optionsdialog was not complete
Move (my)posarr from ClansWindow to DataObject
Move weights from ClansWindow to DataObject
Move inaln from ClansWindow to DataObject
Move the loadGroup method and the code for saveGRoup to DataObject and move (my)attvals from ClansWindow to DataObject
Move mapfiles and lookupfiles from ClansWindow to DataObject
Move seqgroupsvec from ClansWindow to DataObject
Move usescval, blastpath, and formatdbpath from ClansWindow to DataObject
Replace of minpval of ClansWindow by pval of DataObject
Move duplicated code from ClansWindow to optionsdilaog where it belongs to, and some other code improvements
Document useless code for removal in ClansWindow
Move attfactor, attvalpow, repfactor, repvalpow, dampening, minattract, and maxmove from ClansWindow to DataObject
Move cooling and currcool from ClansWindow to DataObject
Use a method for DataObject to determine whether it has blasthits
Move blasthits from ClansWindow to DataObject
Start moving the data fields from ClansWindow to Object data, starting with affyfiles, usefoldchanges, and avgfoldchange, and some code cleanup
Use the same default value in formatdbpath as for DataObject as for ClansWindow
Order the variables chared by DataObject and drawpannel the same way
Sort the variables in ClansWindow and DataObject, by used in ClansWindow, drawpanel, or checkboxes

Give the same default value for pval and minpval, and repfactor in Main, DataObject and ClansWindow,  and other cleanup

Other cleanup: number formats, remove unused variable minpval in DataObject
ClansWindow.java und DataObject.java aktualisiert
Group the variables with values from DataObject in ClansWindow
Rename clustertest to ClansWindow
Move the varables of class clustertest to the beginning, so that they can be better found
Rename customutils to ClansUtils
Remove old *.class files before recompiling to remove *.class files from removed or renamed *.java files
Move saverun from clustertest to DataObject, and make it a member of DataObject
Move the data load functions from customutil to DataObject and make them members of DataObject
Put the members of the DataObject at the top
Rename saverunobject to DataObject to better reflect what it should be about
Convert more keys of HashMaps from Strings into longs
Remove duplicated code of loadtabdata and loaddata, and put it into its own function method clustertest.load
Fix to typos in comments
Do not be verbose and do not clutter the terminal while making clans.jar

Use an IntPair as HashKey instead of a string to save memory

The original HashKey was a String, which is an object and in Java objects always need pointers,
which need in a 64 bit program already 8 bytes. Then each character in a string needs 2 bytes in Java,
which is already for two 2-diget numbers 8 bytes. However, two ints only need 8 bytes and thus can be stored in a long.
This saves quite some memory and should also save time allocating it.
Speed up loading a previous run by setting the initial capacity of the HashMap hsphash and a dontResizeLoadFactor
Do not show dots when loading hsp values, prining on screen slows down the loading, the numbers are enough
Acknowledge the original authors and the README.md and describe the origin of the code, license choice and cite literature
Add README.md and LICENSE.md files
Add bash scripts for compiling CLANS.
Add source of clans from https://web.archive.org/web/20150107161901/http://bioinfoserver.rsbs.anu.edu.au/downloads/clans/clans.jar
